A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve seen the movie twice already. I was caught up in the excitement and felt I had to like it. I saw it again\, and it filled in some holes. I didn’t hate it.\, however\, since seeing it I just feel sad. These characters that I’ve grown up with\, particularly Luke\, were not handled with the care they deserve. It’s like going to a restaurant everyone has been raving about and coming out thinking\, “meh”\, that was just ok.
